effect.red_blue: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.yellow: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.red_green_japan: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.blue_japan: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.

short_effect.red_blue: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
short_effect.yellow: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
short_effect.red_green_japan: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
short_effect.blue_japan: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
